locations.name: Perović (Arslanagić) bridge
locations.description: The most famous monument from the Ottoman period in Trebinje and has a very important place in Balkan architecture of 16th century. Mehmed-Pasha Sokolović built the bridge 1574 in honor to his son who was killed in the battle with Venice.

locations.name: Old Town
locations.description: Trebinje's Old Town, known as Kastel, is a charming historical district nestled along the banks of the Trebišnjica River. Built in the 18th century, its narrow stone streets, traditional Ottoman-style architecture, and well-preserved fortifications transport visitors back in time. It's a peaceful spot, perfect for strolling and soaking in the history and beauty of Trebinje.

locations.name: City of Sun - Water and Dino park
locations.description: Guests can indulge in various amenities, such as a spa, swimming pools, and sports facilities. The complex also features charming walking paths and stunning views of the surrounding hills, making it an ideal destination for families and couples seeking a peaceful retreat in nature.
